```{r}
# ---- Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
library(RSQLite)

db <- "my-db.sqlite"
conn <- dbConnect(drv = SQLite(), dbname = db)

# Write data to connection
dbWriteTable(conn, "cars", mtcars)

# View tables in connection
src_dbi(conn)

# # Disconnect from DB
DBI::dbDisconnect(conn)

# --- Other commands
# copy_to(my_db, plots)
# dbRemoveTable(conn, "sqlite_stat4")
# copy_to(conn, demo)
```
